info.title: IUDX Consent
info.description: API specification for IUDX consent APIs. These APIs are used for registration for various roles, such as Provider, Consumers, Data ingesters and Onboarders.

tags.name: Registration APIs
tags.description: APIs related to registering for different roles

200.description: The registration is successful, and the registration request is pending approval

400.description:
Missing or malformed data. Can occur for:
- `name`
- `phone`
- `email`
- `organization`
- `csr` 
    - Ensure that the CSR is generated using RSA keys, and is in the .PEM format

403.description:
* The email address used has already been used for registration
* An organization with the requested ID does not exist
* If the domain of the organization does not match the provider's email domain

post.description:
Register as a Provider. Provider registration requires a valid Certificate Signing Request (CSR) generated using RSA keys. Check [here](https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/how-generate-certificate-signing-request-csr) for instructions on how to create a CSR on Windows/Linux/Mac. 

Once a Provider has registered successfully, their registration request is subject to approval by an IUDX admin. If the registration is approved, a signed certificate will be sent to the registered email address. This certificate would be used by the Provider for several operations, such as giving consumers access to their resources, auditing tokens issued for their resources and revoking tokens.

organization.description: Valid organization ID obtained GET organization API

csr.description: A valid Certificate Signing Request in .PEM format, generated with RSA keys

email.description: Allowed characters: A-Za-z0-9.-\_@ (email cannot start with .-_@ and must have one @)

requestBody.description:
- `organization` is a valid organization ID obtained from the GET /v1/organizations API
- `csr` is a valid CSR generated using RSA keys.

**NOTE:The newlines in the CSR must be converted into '\n'.** For example, if the CSR is:
```
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
MIIEijCCAnICAQAwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgMClNvbWUtU3RhdGUx
ITAfBgNVBAoMGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZDCCAiIwDQYJKoZIhvcN
AQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAMwdtLPKbncwwBaCVdYoyj1QbnbXhE1T+XQP+OI+
3ZN6qaqrIy6/Q+deSY1QLX6VM28ng8tmW8F9xPsU0LtCEXKBVYovs1b8AntjJc+g
JT58XW4emOIB0Ed5EfVebwexm66Zy0sQyAMcmXK2q1bWx3EwPppqozoHtlhvCXf5
Xi0FYKewIbCvPXo6/DItqWW7XnpkqjRTQXz2UT+h32aVK6gJTJ+Ddsg3mlVsoehV
XvaYAL9zDMC+2BOi1CR9kQnh0QL9QjIwSfvSMx2sVw4HYdkPNpx3LS7eRz5AT7Aq
SSmWpyhkk7mRlMsbgAYIsyZg56acga2vB0iUGUmX8dWU3KA4Yvw0HgC1dmEnTyub
3h5krYa4baMZF6DwCT9ydZjcRmCkyydLu0xtqmC3qRViy/ihRIaDG8vNUuyh9p0A
X+eN0AaARPPDrc+bvwWH6yR1GJx7PLriSgHKbQwppN6pynm8qaOWFzVpdEKKqT0f
NGXza1yFFesIkjX/kxNdJcgAgrchixyKN87+md69mAgBLjpG/hfcR/ZURWTZO8+C
VBJt/bQtp7h692+MJboVD548eLg7X1GN0HUmtErs0vF6cT9kCH3l81kGmghfiEmp
bfRzmJQOHOF2j/NzFbE74TWtLIzXPELNcnxi6tIkgk5lrQf5GOzrbljyZIEUDibT
81yvAgMBAAGgADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFAAOCAgEAwHYlJlTL2e/7c/Kl/jt/9b4/
DB7jaRkohipIkYCC/B8zpY/hSllRM6wAy0wzJ5qdAEWoysuFtufxeNNJwv/Tv2RT
3K95lN9QlQs12A6Kvo8Uh/V+KWi3d1Sy3RR/R1xwCtuYBdhACj9nSs+1ZYw9SB28
EfHoZSRxV9PEsCpmXGHom3/d7JFGCD33nGMocIdSVoqmAjG0atjtLCNHc+hwhRiQ
EDzz7RQ1BySj41NsCoUB9KgnhXxtYthxnOxthQMClLmXSwZr1qZ2Z6BR8wZVVCLp
gH6MQnaHvc2EtzUsTKqePxMdaqL76/WlaIo7D65PCnuyLJnSP2EQt8EKr8gDtGN+
wmXcHuczekfCaqwFySsHT4yNcI7GSTuJYzsNwcVPva9VRnkzjsysvCFSUFNA1byI
NVAyYR3qIDVS8dKEnkGGVuKcSC+eA9uWSlV24na7j/2Uru8AUB+QWBYGUCv5Y4mV
3QPCawo8kwR+Qd61oYnxZOkRrh0l7F7nF3APEEaKnLBJmpmoCKdbRHWHhGMsmE5v
UXBVOs06J6ap59zXHDzTUK6tPqS0QzJM1ApKzy8RB3am/CzPZyZbOwhf7VjgP0ut
eeVVwvaadFOihyWSsKAmr4H7/WporKL2jv15YV0FE2yMib6o0RRSIRdHhJQUYSNv
ymONhiAAAJjT4jAW2Xs=
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
```
, the value for the `csr` field must be
```
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\nMIIEijCCAnICAQAwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgMClNvbWUtU3RhdGUx\nITAfBgNVBAoMGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZDCCAiIwDQYJKoZIhvcN\nAQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAMwdtLPKbncwwBaCVdYoyj1QbnbXhE1T+XQP+OI+\n3ZN6qaqrIy6/Q+deSY1QLX6VM28ng8tmW8F9xPsU0LtCEXKBVYovs1b8AntjJc+g\nJT58XW4emOIB0Ed5EfVebwexm66Zy0sQyAMcmXK2q1bWx3EwPppqozoHtlhvCXf5\nXi0FYKewIbCvPXo6/DItqWW7XnpkqjRTQXz2UT+h32aVK6gJTJ+Ddsg3mlVsoehV\nXvaYAL9zDMC+2BOi1CR9kQnh0QL9QjIwSfvSMx2sVw4HYdkPNpx3LS7eRz5AT7Aq\nSSmWpyhkk7mRlMsbgAYIsyZg56acga2vB0iUGUmX8dWU3KA4Yvw0HgC1dmEnTyub\n3h5krYa4baMZF6DwCT9ydZjcRmCkyydLu0xtqmC3qRViy/ihRIaDG8vNUuyh9p0A\nX+eN0AaARPPDrc+bvwWH6yR1GJx7PLriSgHKbQwppN6pynm8qaOWFzVpdEKKqT0f\nNGXza1yFFesIkjX/kxNdJcgAgrchixyKN87+md69mAgBLjpG/hfcR/ZURWTZO8+C\nVBJt/bQtp7h692+MJboVD548eLg7X1GN0HUmtErs0vF6cT9kCH3l81kGmghfiEmp\nbfRzmJQOHOF2j/NzFbE74TWtLIzXPELNcnxi6tIkgk5lrQf5GOzrbljyZIEUDibT\n81yvAgMBAAGgADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFAAOCAgEAwHYlJlTL2e/7c/Kl/jt/9b4/\nDB7jaRkohipIkYCC/B8zpY/hSllRM6wAy0wzJ5qdAEWoysuFtufxeNNJwv/Tv2RT\n3K95lN9QlQs12A6Kvo8Uh/V+KWi3d1Sy3RR/R1xwCtuYBdhACj9nSs+1ZYw9SB28\nEfHoZSRxV9PEsCpmXGHom3/d7JFGCD33nGMocIdSVoqmAjG0atjtLCNHc+hwhRiQ\nEDzz7RQ1BySj41NsCoUB9KgnhXxtYthxnOxthQMClLmXSwZr1qZ2Z6BR8wZVVCLp\ngH6MQnaHvc2EtzUsTKqePxMdaqL76/WlaIo7D65PCnuyLJnSP2EQt8EKr8gDtGN+\nwmXcHuczekfCaqwFySsHT4yNcI7GSTuJYzsNwcVPva9VRnkzjsysvCFSUFNA1byI\nNVAyYR3qIDVS8dKEnkGGVuKcSC+eA9uWSlV24na7j/2Uru8AUB+QWBYGUCv5Y4mV\n3QPCawo8kwR+Qd61oYnxZOkRrh0l7F7nF3APEEaKnLBJmpmoCKdbRHWHhGMsmE5v\nUXBVOs06J6ap59zXHDzTUK6tPqS0QzJM1ApKzy8RB3am/CzPZyZbOwhf7VjgP0ut\neeVVwvaadFOihyWSsKAmr4H7/WporKL2jv15YV0FE2yMib6o0RRSIRdHhJQUYSNv\nymONhiAAAJjT4jAW2Xs=\n-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\n
```
You may use the following awk command to get the CSR in the required format
```
awk 'NF {sub(/\r/, ""); printf "%s\\n",$0;}' <name-of-csr-file>
```

200.description: Successful registration. If the user is registering for the first time, a signed certificate will be emailed to their registered email address.

value.message: A certificate has been generated and sent to your email
Since you have registered before, please continue to use the certificate that was sent before.

400.description:
Missing or malformed data. Can occur for:
- `name`
- `phone`
- `email`
- `organization`
- `roles`
- `csr` 
    - Ensure that the CSR is generated using RSA keys, and is in the .PEM format

403.description:
- An organization with the requested ID does not exist (applicable for Onboarder and Data Ingester)
- Website of organization and domain of email address does not match (applicable for Onboarder and Data Ingester)
- If the email has been used for Provider registration
- Attempting to register for an already registered role

post.description:
Register for Consumer, Onboarder and Data Ingester roles
* A Consumer can access secure APIs
* An Onboarder can add items to a catalogue on behalf of a Provider
* A Data Ingester can push data into a resource server on behalf of a Provider

If a user is registering for the first time, then a valid Certificate Signing Request (CSR) is required. Check [here](https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/how-generate-certificate-signing-request-csr) for instructions on how to create a CSR on Windows/Linux/Mac

email.description: Allowed characters: A-Za-z0-9.-\_@ (email cannot start with .-_@ and must have one @)

organization.description: Organization ID not required for consumers

csr.description: CSR is necessary if the user has not registered for another role before

requestBody.description:
- An `email` that was used for Provider registration cannot be used for Consumer/Data Ingester/Onboarder registration
- `organization` is a valid organization ID obtained from the GET /v1/organizations API
- ** `organization` field is not required for Consumer registration **
- ** For Onboarders and Data Ingesters, the domain of the email must match the website of the organization **
- `csr` is a valid CSR generated using RSA keys. 

**NOTE:The newlines in the CSR must be converted into '\n'.** For example, if the CSR is:
```
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
MIIEijCCAnICAQAwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgMClNvbWUtU3RhdGUx
ITAfBgNVBAoMGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZDCCAiIwDQYJKoZIhvcN
AQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAMwdtLPKbncwwBaCVdYoyj1QbnbXhE1T+XQP+OI+
3ZN6qaqrIy6/Q+deSY1QLX6VM28ng8tmW8F9xPsU0LtCEXKBVYovs1b8AntjJc+g
JT58XW4emOIB0Ed5EfVebwexm66Zy0sQyAMcmXK2q1bWx3EwPppqozoHtlhvCXf5
Xi0FYKewIbCvPXo6/DItqWW7XnpkqjRTQXz2UT+h32aVK6gJTJ+Ddsg3mlVsoehV
XvaYAL9zDMC+2BOi1CR9kQnh0QL9QjIwSfvSMx2sVw4HYdkPNpx3LS7eRz5AT7Aq
SSmWpyhkk7mRlMsbgAYIsyZg56acga2vB0iUGUmX8dWU3KA4Yvw0HgC1dmEnTyub
3h5krYa4baMZF6DwCT9ydZjcRmCkyydLu0xtqmC3qRViy/ihRIaDG8vNUuyh9p0A
X+eN0AaARPPDrc+bvwWH6yR1GJx7PLriSgHKbQwppN6pynm8qaOWFzVpdEKKqT0f
NGXza1yFFesIkjX/kxNdJcgAgrchixyKN87+md69mAgBLjpG/hfcR/ZURWTZO8+C
VBJt/bQtp7h692+MJboVD548eLg7X1GN0HUmtErs0vF6cT9kCH3l81kGmghfiEmp
bfRzmJQOHOF2j/NzFbE74TWtLIzXPELNcnxi6tIkgk5lrQf5GOzrbljyZIEUDibT
81yvAgMBAAGgADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFAAOCAgEAwHYlJlTL2e/7c/Kl/jt/9b4/
DB7jaRkohipIkYCC/B8zpY/hSllRM6wAy0wzJ5qdAEWoysuFtufxeNNJwv/Tv2RT
3K95lN9QlQs12A6Kvo8Uh/V+KWi3d1Sy3RR/R1xwCtuYBdhACj9nSs+1ZYw9SB28
EfHoZSRxV9PEsCpmXGHom3/d7JFGCD33nGMocIdSVoqmAjG0atjtLCNHc+hwhRiQ
EDzz7RQ1BySj41NsCoUB9KgnhXxtYthxnOxthQMClLmXSwZr1qZ2Z6BR8wZVVCLp
gH6MQnaHvc2EtzUsTKqePxMdaqL76/WlaIo7D65PCnuyLJnSP2EQt8EKr8gDtGN+
wmXcHuczekfCaqwFySsHT4yNcI7GSTuJYzsNwcVPva9VRnkzjsysvCFSUFNA1byI
NVAyYR3qIDVS8dKEnkGGVuKcSC+eA9uWSlV24na7j/2Uru8AUB+QWBYGUCv5Y4mV
3QPCawo8kwR+Qd61oYnxZOkRrh0l7F7nF3APEEaKnLBJmpmoCKdbRHWHhGMsmE5v
UXBVOs06J6ap59zXHDzTUK6tPqS0QzJM1ApKzy8RB3am/CzPZyZbOwhf7VjgP0ut
eeVVwvaadFOihyWSsKAmr4H7/WporKL2jv15YV0FE2yMib6o0RRSIRdHhJQUYSNv
ymONhiAAAJjT4jAW2Xs=
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
```
, the value for the `csr` field must be
```
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\nMIIEijCCAnICAQAwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgMClNvbWUtU3RhdGUx\nITAfBgNVBAoMGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZDCCAiIwDQYJKoZIhvcN\nAQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAMwdtLPKbncwwBaCVdYoyj1QbnbXhE1T+XQP+OI+\n3ZN6qaqrIy6/Q+deSY1QLX6VM28ng8tmW8F9xPsU0LtCEXKBVYovs1b8AntjJc+g\nJT58XW4emOIB0Ed5EfVebwexm66Zy0sQyAMcmXK2q1bWx3EwPppqozoHtlhvCXf5\nXi0FYKewIbCvPXo6/DItqWW7XnpkqjRTQXz2UT+h32aVK6gJTJ+Ddsg3mlVsoehV\nXvaYAL9zDMC+2BOi1CR9kQnh0QL9QjIwSfvSMx2sVw4HYdkPNpx3LS7eRz5AT7Aq\nSSmWpyhkk7mRlMsbgAYIsyZg56acga2vB0iUGUmX8dWU3KA4Yvw0HgC1dmEnTyub\n3h5krYa4baMZF6DwCT9ydZjcRmCkyydLu0xtqmC3qRViy/ihRIaDG8vNUuyh9p0A\nX+eN0AaARPPDrc+bvwWH6yR1GJx7PLriSgHKbQwppN6pynm8qaOWFzVpdEKKqT0f\nNGXza1yFFesIkjX/kxNdJcgAgrchixyKN87+md69mAgBLjpG/hfcR/ZURWTZO8+C\nVBJt/bQtp7h692+MJboVD548eLg7X1GN0HUmtErs0vF6cT9kCH3l81kGmghfiEmp\nbfRzmJQOHOF2j/NzFbE74TWtLIzXPELNcnxi6tIkgk5lrQf5GOzrbljyZIEUDibT\n81yvAgMBAAGgADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFAAOCAgEAwHYlJlTL2e/7c/Kl/jt/9b4/\nDB7jaRkohipIkYCC/B8zpY/hSllRM6wAy0wzJ5qdAEWoysuFtufxeNNJwv/Tv2RT\n3K95lN9QlQs12A6Kvo8Uh/V+KWi3d1Sy3RR/R1xwCtuYBdhACj9nSs+1ZYw9SB28\nEfHoZSRxV9PEsCpmXGHom3/d7JFGCD33nGMocIdSVoqmAjG0atjtLCNHc+hwhRiQ\nEDzz7RQ1BySj41NsCoUB9KgnhXxtYthxnOxthQMClLmXSwZr1qZ2Z6BR8wZVVCLp\ngH6MQnaHvc2EtzUsTKqePxMdaqL76/WlaIo7D65PCnuyLJnSP2EQt8EKr8gDtGN+\nwmXcHuczekfCaqwFySsHT4yNcI7GSTuJYzsNwcVPva9VRnkzjsysvCFSUFNA1byI\nNVAyYR3qIDVS8dKEnkGGVuKcSC+eA9uWSlV24na7j/2Uru8AUB+QWBYGUCv5Y4mV\n3QPCawo8kwR+Qd61oYnxZOkRrh0l7F7nF3APEEaKnLBJmpmoCKdbRHWHhGMsmE5v\nUXBVOs06J6ap59zXHDzTUK6tPqS0QzJM1ApKzy8RB3am/CzPZyZbOwhf7VjgP0ut\neeVVwvaadFOihyWSsKAmr4H7/WporKL2jv15YV0FE2yMib6o0RRSIRdHhJQUYSNv\nymONhiAAAJjT4jAW2Xs=\n-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\n
```
You may use the following awk command to get the CSR in the required format
```
awk 'NF {sub(/\r/, ""); printf "%s\\n",$0;}' <name-of-csr-file>
```

- The `csr` field is not required if the user has already registered as Consumer/Data Ingester/Onboarder
- The valid items for the `roles` array are:
   - `consumer`
   - `onboarder`
   - `data ingester`
 - **Duplicates in the ```roles``` array are ignored**

get.description: Get name and organization ID for all registered organizations
